input.sentences: i just left work when i came upon a car that flipped over .
it was so close to the cement blockade but it did n't quite reach it .
there was no one in the car | thank goodness | but it looked pretty beat up .
there were other people around besides me to see if the owners needed help .
i left the scene shortly after taking pictures .
output.sentences: The police arrived at the scene of the car accident and found an overturned car.
The impact caused a lot of damage to the car.
Despite the severity of the crash, there was no blood or people in the car.
A crowd started to gather from all the commotion from the police.
The police still need to investigate, so the car will need to stay in place until they are done.
